english.segment1: What do you think of. In your room at night while eyes turned over. And wonder through night skies
english.segment2: Do you stay up. And stare at glowing wires. You've said it now. The moon's gone and left me alone
english.segment3: Did you even notice that those words were in my heart. Could have stayed forever in this word of joy and. I won't be long now. I don't belong
english.segment4: So alone, alone. I know it's wrong. I waited an hour for you
english.segment5: Recall the memory of one dream. Where all I wanted was. Ice cream and caramel wings
english.segment6: Did you even notice that those words were in my heart. Could have stayed forever if you weren't apart. Didn't know I waited for this day to end up right where we started. But I know it won't
english.segment7: So alone, alone (To see against the wind, I won't). I know it's wrong (But I won't pray). I waited an hour for you (It's falling down around, like me)
english.segment8: I can't stop wondering. And I won't sleep knowing. I'll wake
